channel.title: Glitched Items
channel.description:
this is made as u can fix your models.. cuz now your server and your client dont got the same models so to fix it open up ur clients class8.java and then if the fighter torso is glicthed then search for fighter torso in the class8.java then change the ID of it to the same ID like in your server. you can do this with any item... now save the changes and compile..
This is from a guide i was following. I did this and it worked for most items, but some items it would put something random as there picture suchs as woad leaves instead of making it a fighter torso. How can i fix that? If its not clear please tell me.

item.title: Glitched Items
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

CoonHunter:

change the drop model back to the fighter torso drop model…

wtf? sad.

@topic- make SURE you have the ints also for class8…and the right model

Read full topic

item.title: Glitched Items
item.dc:creator: @Legit_Glitch Legit Glitch
item.description:
@Legit_Glitch wrote:

this is made as u can fix your models.. cuz now your server and your client dont got the same models so to fix it open up ur clients class8.java and then if the fighter torso is glicthed then search for fighter torso in the class8.java then change the ID of it to the same ID like in your server. you can do this with any item... now save the changes and compile..

This is from a guide i was following. I did this and it worked for most items, but some items it would put something random as there picture suchs as woad leaves instead of making it a fighter torso.

How can i fix that?
If its not clear please tell me.

Read full topic
